page.title: 06Housing in Horwich
page.content: The majority of people in the area live in{semi-detached houses.}The rest live almost equally in either{detached {or terraced houses. The outside of most of these houses are brick with the rest having cladded or painted exteriors. There is a slight majority of houses which have {double glazing. The most popular form of heating is {gas central heating.}The number of bedrooms varies from house to house and can be from two to four with three the most common. Most houses have only one toilet. Most have gardens on front and rear with a few having them at the side as well. These range from small plots to large lawns bordered with flower beds. Most houses have a single garage although some have double ones. The ages of houses vary greatly.
